description.message: This hint checks if the HTML is using the most modern DOCTYPE.

doctypeNotDuplicated.description: Report message when a doctype is duplicated
doctypeNotDuplicated.message: 'doctype' is not needed as one was already specified.

doctypeNotSpecified.description: Report message when a doctype is not specified

doctypeSpecifiedAs.description: Report message when a doctype is not specified as '<!doctype html>'

doctypeSpecifiedBefore.description: Report message when a doctype is not the first thing in the html
doctypeSpecifiedBefore.message: 'doctype' should be specified before anything else.

resourceNoContent.description: Report message when the resource has no content
